data.title: Writing Tools - by Roy Peter Clark
data.text:
ISBN: 0316014990

Date read: 2015-11-05

How strongly I recommend it: 7/10

(See my list of 360+ books, for more.)

Go to the Amazon page for details and reviews.

Great advice on how to be a better writer. Unfortunately the authorâ€™s writing style is distracting. How strange to take advice from someone not taking it themselves. Like a drunk telling you not to drink. Right after reading this book I gave it a terrible rating because of that, but now I realize its points and advice (in my notes, below) are truly great.

my notes
